text: The Phantom Carriage (, literally "The Wagoner") is a 1921 Swedish fantasy horror movie directed by Victor Sjöström (who also stars) and based on the 1912 novel Thy Soul Shall Bear Witness! (Körkarlen) by Selma Lagerlöf. It stars Hilda Borgström, Tore Svennberg, Astrid Holm, Concordia Selander and was distributed by AB Svensk Filmindustri. It was remade in 1958. ==Other websites== * * Category:1921 movies Category:1920s fantasy movies Category:1920s horror movies Category:Swedish silent movies Category:Swedish fantasy movies Category:Swedish horror movies Category:Movies directed by Victor Sjöström Category:Movies about alcoholism Category:Movies about death
title: The Phantom Carriage
